name: Lint Doctor
description: Diagnose and fix linting issues across multiple languages
longDescription: Auto-detects your stack from config files (`package.json`, `Cargo.toml`, `go.mod`, `pyproject.toml`, `pom.xml`, `build.gradle`) and configures linting with best-practice rules. Supports 5 language ecosystems: JavaScript/TypeScript with React/Vue/Angular (ESLint + sonarjs, unicorn), Python (Ruff), Rust (Clippy), Go (`golangci-lint`), and Java (Checkstyle, Google style). Includes 6 dedicated reference docs per language plus pre-commit hook setup. Offers interactive or automatic modes with 3 strictness levels, handles monorepos with workspace detection, and optionally sets up husky/`lint-staged` or pre-commit hooks. Classifies rules by severity: errors for bugs/security, warnings for complexity/style, off for formatting.
